Title: SilverLight Personal WebSite
Description:
A personal website template using SilverLight in C#. The purpose of which it to use and integrate various MS technologies into a funky UI.
Functionality: photos, videos, bio/about, links, blogs, fileshare etc.   
Tools: Expression Blend, VS 2008 SP1 w/ TFS client, t-SQL, C#
